body.name: Novogratz Bushwick Metal Crib with Adjustable Mattress Height, Olive
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 23 mins
features: A classic extension of spirited modern design now made especially for your infant, this joyful baby crib dons all the stylish bells and whistles with cheerful accented posts lining both the front and back arched panels and side panels

JPMA certified and designed to meet or exceed all applicable ASTM and CPSC safety standards, this quality piece of nursery furniture comes in trendy olive and off-white non-toxic finishes and is free of phthalates, latex, lead, and BPA

Made with a strong all metal frame build, the crib has been designed to meet the needs of your growing baby with 3 height adjustable mattress positions to foster safe and secured sleep. Fits a standard size crib mattress (sold separately)

Arrives in one easy to handle box with all parts, tools, and instructions included for fast uncomplicated assembly. Once your child can climb out of the crib or reaches 35 inches in height, please transition to a toddler bed (not included)
Crib dimensions: 54.5”L x 29.5”W x 42.5”H. Net weight: 46.5 lbs. Weight limit: 50 lbs. Shipping dimensions: 53.5”L x 30.5”W x 6.5”H. Gross weight: 54.5 lbs. 1-year limited warranty
body.description: If fun-loving and cheeky are some of the words that you’d use to describe your cute-faced baby, then the Novogratz Bushwick Metal Crib is right up your alley when it comes to picking out the best nursery furniture suited to your infant’s precocious personality. The newest incarnation of celebratory modern design, the Bushwick Metal Crib borrows inspiration from classic style elements to make you and your child smile. Joyfully accented posts inside the arched front and end panels and straight side panels usher in a playful mood. Constructed with safety and comfortable sleep being the leading principles, the Bushwick features a strong steel base for crib mattress support and for weathering fast-paced movements. Adaptable to sudden growth spurts, the Bushwick includes 3 adjustable mattress heights to keep babies protected and from being able to easily climb out of the crib. Having exceeded all applicable ASTM and CPSC safety standards, this quality JPMA Certified crib is guaranteed to be free from lead, phthalates, latex, lead, and BPA and is coated in a non-toxic finish.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Creating a boutique experience for the modern family. For over 25 years, husband and wife design duo Cortney and Robert Novogratz have been designing and developing spaces around the world. The Novogratzes' love of design, art, and architecture have driven their careers - they've rebuilt entire city blocks, renovated a Hollywood Hills castle, and built a treehouse in Brazil, amongst other cool projects. Their impeccable taste and commitment to attainability bring high-end design to the masses. The family currently resides in the Hollywood Hills with their seven children (Wolfgang, Bellamy, Tallulah, Breaker, Five, Holleder and Major). They're thrilled to launch a line of products designed to bring energy, comfort and cool into your home.

Home is Where the Art is Bring the focal point to a statement piece with a modern or vintage inspired futon. It's All About the Details Thoughtful construction and attention to detail make these furniture pieces stand out. Inspired by Family Durability, affordability and functionality keep your home fun and carefree without compromising on style! Designed with You in Mind From modern to chic and vintage-inspired, the Novogratz collection is sure to have something unique to your needs.

Novogratz Futons & Sectionals From modern to vintage-inspired, there’s a Novogratz futon, sectional or sleeper sofa to fit your quirky and fun lifestyle. Novogratz Upholstered Beds With an impeccable combination of charm and contemporary design, our sturdy beds offer superior support with a superior bentwood slat system. Novogratz Metal Beds Stylish and classy, our metal beds have a clean silhouette and are crafted in sturdy metal to provide you top support. Novogratz Daybeds These 3-in-1 pieces can be used a sofa, bed or guest bed, bringing functionality and versatility to your home. Futons, Sectionals, Sleepers Upholstered Beds Metal Beds Daybeds

Why Novogratz? Multifunctional Furniture Whether is futon sofas that turn into beds or beds with storage compartments, our practical furniture helps you make the most of your home! Trendy Designs Bring energy, comfort and cool into your home with quality materials and great designs! Assembly in No Time! With an easy and quick assembly, and impeccable designs at affordable prices, what’s not to love?
